A few more beers

Thought I had a lot more beers to upload but it turns out it’s only another 10. I think my drunken, social self missed out a few during more birthday event. The big one here is the Wolfmother triple IPA that I’ve been waiting a long time to drink. Not let down at all.

Brewdog hop fiction pale ale 8.5/10

To Øl wit or witout 6/10

Skorubrew #17 7.5/10

Wild yak pacific ale 7/10

Koshihikari echigo 7/10

Modus operandi session IPA 7/10

Kalnapils pilsner 7/10

Golden road wolf mother triple IPA 9/10

Beer of the dead porter 8/10

Golden road saison citron 6/10
